Address.Address1: MOO 5, NAI YANG BEACH ROAD, T. SAKHU, A. MUANG 65/23-24

Description.Text: Nai Yang Beach Resort offers 168 rooms of low-rise buildings with contemporary, Oriental & Thai style providing comfortable, pleasant & relaxing atmosphere and peaceful environment. Note 1 : Below 12 years sharing beds with parents FOC. Extra breakfast is THB250/child/day or extra bed is THB800/child/night+ABF (if required for children ages 4 and above) The hotel provides airport transfer (chargeable), room service / 10.00 - 22.00hrs. Note 2 : - Period on 01/11/12 - 30/04/13 : @400 Baht deduct for Room Only (SGL/TWN) / Extra Bed @500 Baht (Exclude Breakfast) - Period on 01/05/13 - 31/10/13 : @300 Baht deduct for Room Only (SGL/TWN) / Extra Bed @500 Baht (Exclude Breakfast). Baby sitting service / Outsource / On requests in advance, subject to availability (300 Baht/Hour), Banquet facilities (prices depending on requirements), Barbecue area (on request, chargeable depending on requirements), Beauty Salon/Hairdresser / Outsource at Plaza, Currency exchange / Exchange booths at Plaza, Doctor on call (chargeable), Dry cleaning / Outsource, Gift shop / Outsource at Plaza, Golf course / Nearest Golf Course, Blue Canyon is approx 10mins drive, Internet access - High-Speed / FOC at lobby & La Romana Restaurant only, other areas are chargeable from 60-1,100 Baht (30mins - 5 days), Laundry service / Outsource, Library / Only book shelves at lobby, Lift / Elevator (Thai Deluxe building only), Lobby, Reception, Safe deposit box / in-room, FOC, Swimming pool - outdoor (3 pools).
Nai Yang Beach Resort located next to the "Sirinart National Park". Only 8 minutes away from Phuket International Airport & a few steps from white sand beach and turquoise water of the Andaman Sea.

Tropical Wing (38sq.m.) - Tropical Wing (38sq.m.) offers one double bed or two twin beds with air conditioning, bathrobe (provided for turtle pool & thana grand pool villas) only, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, color TV, hairdryer, internet access / foc at lobby & la romana restaurant only, other areas are chargeable from 60-1,100 baht (30 mins-5 days), on request, subject to availability, non-smoking rooms, laundry service / outsource, mini bar, refrigerator, room service / 10.00 - 22.00hrs, safe in room / foc, tea and coffee making facilities / foc and telephone. Featuring as standard room with pool or garden views. Simple yet cozy & peaceful atmosphere with affordable price.
Oriental wing (45sq. M.) - Oriental wing (45sq. M.) offers one double bed or two twin beds with air conditioning, bathrobe (provided for turtle pool & thana grand pool villas) only, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, color TV, hairdryer, internet access / foc at lobby & la romana restaurant only, other areas are chargeable from 60-1,100 baht (30 mins-5 days), on request, subject to availability, non-smoking rooms, laundry service / outsource, mini bar, refrigerator, room service / 10.00 - 22.00hrs, safe in room / foc, tea and coffee making facilities / foc and telephone. Relaxing and functional design with a touch of Oriental style and separate shower & WC.
Thai Deluxe (45sq.M. - Thai Deluxe (45sq.M.) offers one double bed or two twin beds with air conditioning, bathrobe (provided for turtle pool & thana grand pool villas) only, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, color TV, hairdryer, internet access / foc at lobby & la romana restaurant only, other areas are chargeable from 60-1,100 baht (30 mins-5 days), on request, subject to availability, non-smoking rooms, laundry service / outsource, mini bar, refrigerator, room service / 10.00 - 22.00hrs, safe in room / foc, tea and coffee making facilities / foc and telephone. Offering a panoramic view of natural vegetation pine trees and/or tropical garden view. Featuring luxurious, comfortable and warm Thai contemporary design.
Thai Deluxe Premium (45sq.M. - Thai Deluxe Premium (45sq.M.) offers one double bed or two twin beds with air conditioning, bathrobe (provided for turtle pool & thana grand pool villas) only, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, color TV, hairdryer, internet access / foc at lobby & la romana restaurant only, other areas are chargeable from 60-1,100 baht (30 mins-5 days), on request, subject to availability, non-smoking rooms, laundry service / outsource, mini bar, refrigerator, room service / 10.00 - 22.00hrs, safe in room / foc, tea and coffee making facilities / foc and telephone. Situated on the 3rd floor. All rooms equipped with island king size beds, bathtub and private balcony overlooking swimming pool or tropical vegetation.
Thai Mini Suite (49sq.M.) - Thai Mini Suite (49sq.M.) offers one double bed and two twin beds with air conditioning, bathrobe (provided for turtle pool & thana grand pool villas) only, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, color TV, hairdryer, internet access / foc at lobby & la romana restaurant only, other areas are chargeable from 60-1,100 baht (30 mins-5 days), on request, subject to availability, non-smoking rooms, laundry service / outsource, mini bar, refrigerator, room service / 10.00 - 22.00hrs, safe in room / foc, tea and coffee making facilities / foc and telephone. Featuring a contemporary Thai design and Oriental style with separate living room providing more comfort & relaxing atmosphere.
